name: Big Batch Summer Burgers
description: We love the full flavour of these burgers made with our Burger Seasoning and a hit of our Honey Mustard, too.

ingredients.name: Burger Seasoning or Beef & Steak Seasoning
Honey Mustard , Sweet & Spicy Mustard or Dijon-style mustard

preparation: Crumble beef into a large bowl.
Using your hands, gently mix to combine evenly.
Divide mixture into 12–14 portions and form each into a ball. Flatten to form patties.

Individually wrap burgers, or portion into family-sized packs. Be sure to separate each burger with a piece of parchment or waxed paper. Snugly wrap with plastic, then place in freezer bags. Freeze up to 2 months.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve on a burger bun with your choice of burger toppings and with 1 cup sliced veggies.

products.name: Burger Seasoning
summary: Tired of bland burgers? Level up with one simple seasoning that’s packed with the robust flavours of onion, garlic, and red bell pepper, and a mild paprika kick. Just combine the seasoning with ground beef, chicken, pork, or turkey for mouth-watering burgers every single time.

products.name: Beef & Steak Seasoning
summary: An all-purpose blend with mild heat & aromatic flavour.

products.name: Honey Mustard
summary: A bold twist on a classic condiment made with 100% Canadian mustard seed and organic honey.

products.name: Sweet & Spicy Organic Mustard
summary: Golden, sweet, with just the right heat. You’ll love this on burgers and Nashville Hot Chicken Sandwiches—or as a dip for chicken fingers. It’s also amazing in potato salad and salad dressings.
